title: Alesha Dixon says she had to confirm her second pregnancy to public
text:
She confirmed her second pregnancy while appearing on the Britain's Got Talent live shows in May, but Alesha Dixon admits she would have been happy to keep it under wraps for the full nine months.

The 41-year old revealed her prominent baby bump during the opening live show of Britain's Got Talent's thirteenth series, prompting surprise from fans and confirmation from show hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly.

However Alesha says she might never have gone public with the news had it not been for her commitment as a judge on the long-running show.

Private: Alesha Dixon says she might never have gone public with her pregnancy had it not been for her commitment as a judge on Britain's Got Talent

Speaking to Terri Seymour on Wednesday morning's edition of Lorraine, she explained: 'I managed to go six months keeping it quiet… I don’t go out of my way to keep it quiet.

'I never feel this strong need to declare everything. I think everything in it’s time. I think the way the pregnancy was announced with Ant and Dec on the show was just really sweet, obviously at that point I couldn’t hide it any more.'

The birth of daughter Anaya - her second child with husband Azuka Ononye - was confirmed during a recent appearance in the United States, and Alesha admits she feels more relaxed this time around.

Big news: The 41-year old revealed her prominent baby bump during the opening live show of Britain's Got Talent's thirteenth series

'When I had (first child) Azura I didn’t leave the house for about two months, here I am Anaya is two months and I’m already in America, I’m working and it all feels right and it feels good,' she explained.

'I don’t know if it’s just the fact that she’s my second and I’m more relaxed but I’m happy so nothing feels stressful.'

Alesha also compared her post-baby body to 'a kangaroo pouch' as she revealed the secret behind how she squeezed into a PVC dress just seven weeks after giving birth.

Congratulations: The birth of daughter Anaya - her second child with husband Azuka Ononye - was confirmed during a recent appearance in the United States

As Terri congratulated her on the new arrival, Alesha said: 'There is! I call it my little kangaroo pouch!'

The BGT judge was then asked how she managed to fit into the skintight red PVC dress she wore to film America's Got Talent: The Champions, which came just weeks after she gave birth.

She joked: 'Spanx are a girl’s best friend Terri, let’s be honest. It takes a lot of effort, it takes a lot of work, just to get Spanx on!'

Discussing how she's stayed in shape since giving birth, Alesha added: 'I've always allowed my body to do what it naturally does. I’ve not gone on any silly diets. I think getting help has really helped, having my mum around.

'Sleep is everything. Honestly, when you have more than five hours sleep with a new born baby, you can take on the world.'
description: Alesha admits she may well have never gone public with the news had it not been for her commitment as a judge on Britain's Got Talent.
